page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT.
page.content: { West Park Nusery}was built 20 years ago to provide plants for parks and gardens in York.Altogether there are 98 workers,about 5 are gardeners,4 work in the offices and the rest are sent on outdoor jobs away from the Nursery. In Micklegate the{shops}employ people and get lots of customers;many of the people go to see Micklegate Bar and buy souvenirs and presents.Many of the people who live in our block depend upon the tourist trade in some way for their jobs. A{taxi}is a car that takes people from place to place for money:a car is a vehicle with 5 wheels including the spare wheel.Some cars can do 60 miles on a gallon of petrol but others use a lot more.We found that a lot of people in our area have jobs that involve driving-like taxi drivers for example.
